oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Union Soldier Charles H. Chatfield
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Batchellor and Chatfield Family Papers, Civil War Letters of Charles H. and Clark S. Chatfield
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 item (letter), Poor, Envelope is 8.5 x15 cm., 31 x 20 cm
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chatfield, Charles H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Union Soldier Charles H. Chatfield in North Chickamauga, Georgia. 12/18/1863 Letter from Union soldier Charles H. Chatfield in North Chickamauga, George to his brother and sister in the Colorado Territory. The letter was written after the Union victory at Chattanooga. The envelope is addressed to Miss Ellen Chatfield in Beaver Creek, Tremont County, Colorado Territory.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chatfield, Charles H.
Batchellor, Ellen (Nellie) Chatfield,--1847-1928
United States Civil War, 1861-1865
Correspondence
